Key Match Events: Brewers rookie Jackson Chourio struck a game-tying 398-foot home run off Mets reliever Phil Maton in the eighth inning
Brewers designated hitter Garrett Mitchell smacked a two-run home run off Maton in the eighth inning
Post-Match Reflections: New York now faces a winner-take-all Game 3 in Milwaukee on Thursday at 7:08 p.m. ET
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets had 15 hits, only two for extra bases, and nine walks in their two Wild Card games against Milwaukee
The Mets have stolen more bases than the Brewers in the series
The game was played at American Family Field in Milwaukee
Others: Mets starter Sean Manaea held Milwaukee to just two earned runs in five innings
Mets relievers threw two scoreless innings before Maton took the ball in the eighth inning
